website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, slim pitcher that produces alkaline water while also filtering out basic contaminants.
pros: Slim pitcher fits easily in fridge
LED timer reminds you when its time to replace filter
Reported improvements with various health issues from using this pitcher
cons: Filtration system is slow and requires some patience

customer_reviews.title: pH 9.8!
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit, I'm amazed. As a very skeptical person, I made sure to test this water with my new and calibrated pH meter. Here are comparisons of 4 types of water with their readings: tap water, 7.2; distilled, 5.5; essentia brand bottled water, 9.5; Dragonn Alkaline Water Pitcher, 9.8. This is a keeper. Too bad I just bought 7 bottles of essentia! Now let's see if this alkaline water improves my health....
customer_reviews.author: NYC Girl

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best one I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the third alkaline water pitcher I've purchased in the past year. Finally found one that the lid stays on when pouring. The water tastes smooth and the filter has a faster drip than the others. This is by far the best one I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a water filter that increased the alkaline in our drinking water. Every bit the skeptic, I reviewed the heck out of all the filters out there that claim do just that. I decided on this filter. It arrived quickly, with no issues. I followed the easy and quick instructions for setup and had a full pitcher of water ready in less than 30 minutes. I got my ph tester out and tested the water. My previous filtration pitcher (Pur) tested at 7.8. My Dragonn tested at 9.1. Awesome! Water tastes great! I've had it for about a month, tested the water again, still sitting at a 9.1, 9.2. Happy customer! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need alkaline water?
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased 6 filters. I really like the count down clock on the lid so you know when to change the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Do not use this filter, will cause health problems ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this filter, will cause health problems.. I am looking at kidney stones forming after a couple months of use. This does not make ionized water it is simply adding chemicals to produce a higher ph. Do the research!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s the same pH as tap water!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even want to give it one star but I had to. I purchased this a little over a month ago and it’s too bad I just found out that my return window closed because I just opened the pitcher this morning and tested the filtered water with my pH strips and it comes out at 7.0, same as my tap water. Wasted my money...
customer_reviews.author: banana momma

customer_reviews.title: WORST ALKALINE PITCHER EVER!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst pitcher I've purchased. The whole reason someone buys an alkaline and/or contaminate (in general) pitcher is to keep the tap water out of one's drinking water. This pitcher hasn't worked correctly from day one. I've only used the company's filters!!!! pH has never been above 7.0!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Tasty water
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pitcher for a while now, I've noticed a couple manufacturing issues but nothing serious. The water it's self comes out crisp and tasty and that's what matters to me. I even use this water for my pets, my pets, family and myself now feel healthier drinking alkaline water The little door at the top where you add water sticks a bit and the filter could make a better seal. Over all I'm very satisfied with my purchase, and I'm happy that the water is more alkaline then a Brita filter would put out. The only thing that would be better is if it added B12 to the water, lol. Happy water drinking everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Havah

customer_reviews.title: Better than bottled
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day! We have very high iron in our well water and have to treat it with a bleach injection system. Needless to say we do not drink it. I was tired of buying bottled water so I bought this. The water is purified and alkalined at the same time and tastes amazing! I highly recommend this product. We even use the water from this for our new coffee maker and it still looks brand new. Our tap water would have it rusted by now. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Crap
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product spend your money on something better! Filter does not seal in pitcher so water runs around and doesn't actually get filtered. I bought 2 and both do the same thing. I have tried to wipe dry and re assemble several times and it just doesn't work. I reached out to the compliant and have yet to hear anything. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Plugged immediately
customer_reviews.text: Looked over all the reviews and decided upon this pitcher to give alkaline water. When I received it, followed the broken English instructions closely, even using a timer where required. Filter plugged on second use with tap water (my water is already run through a whole house filtration unit). Tested what water that did go through it and pH was identical to the tap water. Full disclosure- tap water did measure pH of 8, but there was no change with what little water did go through the filter. Will be returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely better than a 4 but not quite a 5
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could actually give this 4.5 stars. It’s definitely better than a 4 but not quite a 5. The pitcher easily fits in my refrigerator, the water filters reasonably quickly and tastes great and the pitcher is even ergonomically friendly enough it’s far easier to handle than any Brita I’ve had. My one complaint is that it’s a bit of guesswork to figure out what’s “enough” water without being “too much” and if you get it wrong, putting too much in, the extra water easily pushes the lid of resulting in a wet mess. Seems like there should be a fix to this or to prevent it other than guessing low on how much water to add.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: What I like about this water pitcher compared to other ones is ...
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this water pitcher compared to other ones is its size, it holds a really good amount to only have to refill once a day. The only thing that could make this product better is if they offered an option in GLASS for your customers who are trying to avoid plastic in their life but would still like high quality alkaline water without purchasing the big system. Would HAPPILY pay double for one with a GLASS pitcher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Looking for alkaline water filter for heartburn.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work to increase pH of water. Very disappointed with this product. Even with the filtering quality. It was not far off in range from tap water. The ph of tap is about 7.44 and the Dragonn filtered water is about 7.45z this is after about 5 days of use. The first pic is tap and the second is filtered. April 2020. I have been looking for alkaline water filters to see if it makes a difference with my heartburn I’ve had for about a year now. The alkaline bottled water has been helping out for about a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Medic1106

customer_reviews.title: Tested and Wife Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! We were getting tired of purchasing bottles of alkaline water and lugging them around. We purchased the Dragonn pH pitcher and a test kit. Our city water and the major wholesaler's alkaline water both tested a light green (about a 5) and the Dragonn filtered water tested a dark blue (almost purple, about an 8.5). Wow! What a difference. This product will pay for itself in a couple months. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical but buying the product and so far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I was initially skeptical about alkalized water.My husband’s doctor told my husband to use alkalized water after diagnosing him with LPR. I had sour stomach so decided to drink the water too. No more sour stomach so maybe it is working or it might be placebo effect. Will never know but ... product was delivered promptly and I just had a question about directions but email only way to get answer. I like speaking to a live voice. Update ... filter has stopped working and no reply
customer_reviews.author: Picky Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Think mine is broken
customer_reviews.text: I love a good charcoal filter and it seems to be a great product, but I clearly have charcoal dripping through to the bottom drinking water. Oh no! It seems as though the water comes out cloudier than it goes in. I’ve had water get stuck at the top and not go through to the bottom. I had to dump out the water, shake the filter, and try again. Maybe I have a faulty filter? Although it seems good, I personally know someone with one that works fine, I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Penn

customer_reviews.title: definitely more alkaline
customer_reviews.text: Living with A lot of inflammation I will try anything that may help. I have only had it for a few days but I did test the water against my tap water which comes in neutral in PH. This pitcher gave my tap water a huge shift to the alkaline levels. Looking forward to seeing how this helps my inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: C. Aase

customer_reviews.title: Run far far way from this water pitcher
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst water pitcher/filter I’ve ever come into contact with. The design is flawed. Pressure builds between filter & exit hole preventing water from flowing correctly. It leaks water down the side of the filter constantly. If you don’t take the filter out and shake it every time you refill water will not flow. One good thing - The water taste is good. The fact that you have to put so much effort into getting filtered water out of this contraption could be the reason why the water tastes so good. Run far far way from this water pitcher. I bought another one within a week of purchasing this one. GodSpeed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: I squeezed it a bit under running water and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: I had doubts about this eventho I bought it but when I tested the water I felt reassured. The water tested above 8.0 and that was from acidic water. Note : the filter takes a few days to flow properly because of trapped air. I squeezed it a bit under running water and it worked fine. 2020. Now and I found the original filter I referred to above that I discarded. I ran some water tru and tested it. Suprising to me it read 8.0 zone. I suggest to everyone buy the original replacement filter and not the generic blue ones. They dont work.
customer_reviews.author: saleem

customer_reviews.title: Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for my girlfriend and one for my house. Both shipped from two different locations & two separate deliverable dates. Reason I mention is is that BOTH don’t work. We followed directions on both and no “black” water came out to charge the filter. So we assumed hers was fine. Mine came. Same thing. Hers at least drips and filters water... I hope. Mine doesn’t drip water at all. Given schools around my area have tested positive for lead and other issues ..I had high hopes this would save us from having to buy bottle & reduce waste. Nah tho.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Product has flaws but company has good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product has its flaws. The pitcher is very durable but sometimes water sits in the upper part and other times filter gets jammed and barely any water gets through. The led timer stopped working less than a month in. Luckily the manufacturer has great customer service and they quickly replaced the parts that were defective. Now filter is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Dessert_Expert

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and water tastes great! We even tested the water and it makes our water alkaline. We recommend this product. Only tiny issue is that we need to shake up the filter every so often to make the water go through the filter. It seems inside of filter gets solid because of the pressure and weight from the water. Other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: YH

customer_reviews.title: Happily Hydrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after learning how important the minerals in water are in maintaining a healthy body and after learning the reverse osmosis water I’ve been drinking for over a decade didn’t have any. On top of that, the pH of RO water is more acidic than what is optimal for our bodies. I am thrilled this alkaline pitcher takes care of all of those issues! I purchased two: one for my workplace and one for home, and I am, finally, happily hydrated properly!
customer_reviews.author: Celine M Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until the top stopped working. I don’t know what day I’m on to change the filter. I wonder if water fell in it and messed it up :/ had this maybe 3 years
customer_reviews.author: Miss_gizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like floaters in your filtered water.
customer_reviews.text: So there are little particulates floating around in the “ filtered” part of the pitcher. Also after only a weeks use ( 3 or 4 refills) the filter has almost completely clogged to where it takes hours for the thing to filter. Maybe it is only supposed to filter soft water, I don’t know. Disappointed. P.S. the handle creaks when pouring and doesn’t look like it will last that long before separating in two as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It barely works in all aspects.
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start? This is my second review ever on here. The set up is easy, but the design is flawed? The water doesn’t go through the filter most of the time and just sits on top of it until it starts to smell. Who wants smelly water? Then, after several uses, about 6 half way filled up pitchers, my filter was just barely producing alkaline water. I tested with ph strips. Don’t waste your money buying this. I’m not sure if it’s a flaw in the design of the pitcher or horrible filter. And the filters only last a week.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Important tips for use
customer_reviews.text: The pitcher does what I bought it for very well. The design of the pitcher would be improved if the compartment that holds the filter had an open bottom so that the water could filter through more quickly. The instructions for use also need to be written out in plain language steps than in pictures. Nowhere in my kit was it written that you need to peel the plastic adhesive off the bottom of the filter before use. It would also help if that plastic adhesive was of a more visible color (red, green, deep blue).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L.

customer_reviews.title: After testing the water for pH I see no difference ...
customer_reviews.text: After testing the water for pH I see no difference in the water coming out of my picture and water coming out of my faucet this is all a bunch of hype.
customer_reviews.author: AShoppingQueen

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pitcher, it is quite large, so not necessary to fill all the time. I was curious with the sale of alkaline bottled warer being so expensive, or investing in a home water system to produce alkaline water, if this pitcher and the filter would really work. I filled it according to the instructions, and then took a pool test strip to measure the alkalinity/ph level. It came out perfect! I am very pleased that i have found a reasonably priced and easy to use product to produce the water i want. Thank you for making an excellent pitcher, and filter!
customer_reviews.author: Margaux

customer_reviews.title: Better than bottled mineral water!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a PUR fan, but it started tasting more and more like Britta so I tried this. Incredible! The water tastes amazing, far superior to any other I've tried. The tap water where I live is undrinkable, but this makes it taste like the finest mineral water. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Procter

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fill all the way and water stays in holding tank well before pitcher is full. The filter just stops water flow. It’s an open box deal so I can’t return but so I’ll make due but I’m not happy with this and don’t really recommmend unless this is defective. I did follow directions for filter placement and even took it out and tried again same problem. I do get some water so it’s better than nothing, right?
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Double filtered and tastes way better.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this dual with a Brita filter jug. I pour Britta filtered water into this and the water actually tastes better. Once I go through a couple of uses. And get an actual pH tester will be updating my review but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Marc T.

customer_reviews.title: Great alkaline filter
customer_reviews.text: The water tastes great, and the counter on the lid sealed the deal. I love the fact that when the top reservoir it full and you pour the container at an angle it does not leak. The price is a bit much for what it does, but since it is a highly efficient filter.
customer_reviews.author: EPG

customer_reviews.title: Update-We're trying another filter.  The first one lasted less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: Update-A new filter was delivered yesterday. The original was completely clogged in less than a week. Will let you know if this filter is better. The pitcher was easy to set up, the water tastes great, the reservoir is a good size. Con- the filter has already clogged up once and we've only had the pitcher less than a week. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: JBeaux

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always work
customer_reviews.text: When the water does flow through it tastes great and I love it, but sometimes it won't filter through and just sits in the top. I have tried removing the filter and putting it back, I don't know why this happens.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Vee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall works good. 8.8 ph which is what I had been buying. Even my son thinks water tastes better. Makes better coffee. Found that it works best if pour water in the top section and don't move it at all once it starts filtering. Also best to let filter all the way before pouring. Have only had a few days so not sure about length of filter.
customer_reviews.author: April Miller-LePage

customer_reviews.title: Great water pitcher
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher exceeded my expectations. It is easy to use, the lid stays on when pouring, and the timer on top is an added bonus. About the 10th water refill noticed that the filter was sluggish. The directions where simple but didn’t have any troubleshooting advice. Anyway a quick internet search and all that was needed was a good shake of the filter and a rinse through water. Now it runs like a champ again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Fits nicely in the fridge. The water is great. We use it for our coffee maker and also to drink rather than the refrigerator water at times. The only thing is the lid doesn’t seem extremely tight, butitmayhave been just placed incorrectly by myself. We haven’t had any issues since the first time. I am especially excited as we have some leftover filters from a Mavea pitcher that broke and they seem interchangeable!!
customer_reviews.author: Kriste E

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Really does a terrible job of filtering. The water just doesn't go through the pitcher. Followed all instructions, even tried new filter. Still very chalkey water with not good taste. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JCKitty

customer_reviews.title: Shake the filter when it stops working.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my water tastes w/this filtered pitcher. The battery feature stopped working a couple days after using it. It started working again just recently. The frustrating part about this filter is sometimes the filtered water comes out in a steady stream and sometimes it is a slow drip. I have to take the filter out and shake it about every 3 days so i get filtered water.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: The filter inside stops filtering water into the pitcher randomly like every other day. I read another review after purchase that says to take the filter out and shake it to make it run water through again and drain into the pitcher. That’s frustrating since I have to pour out water to get it to work, and then fill it up again. It’s slower than a Brita to filter water. Take many hours.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can pour, even when there is water still filtering through the top. Screen/Battery died quickly though, within a couple of weeks. We use quite a bit (family of 5 water drinkers), we've already purchased filter cartridges, my husband was blown away at the filth that the original filter caught when switching out the filter replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia2tot

customer_reviews.title: 7.5 pH at best
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to use. The inside reservoir set up is strange. If it doesn’t completely filter, then when you pour a glass of water, the unfiltered and filtered water combine in your glass. After running several pitchers through the filter, the highest pH we’ve gotten is 7.5. A far cry from 9.5 and higher it advertises. I’ve atrached a photo of the water before it’s filtered and after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The best best alkaline pitcher. I only drink alkaline water which can get expensive. This is t real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Vidosh

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, just what I ordered. Works great ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DW Jones

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher made such a difference. I’ve drank tap water for longer then I should have, never again. Numerous friends have commented on how good and crisp the water is. It’s water, it shouldn’t have a taste and this pitcher does the trick. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic to have alkaline water without having to go buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The filter was a little difficult to place, but once I figured it out all was fine
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Improved!
customer_reviews.text: This filter definitely improves the taste of water. We're on a well, and we have a large amount of rust in the water. Our water tastes cleaner, looks great and I am glad we purchased this unit. For the price you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Nancie A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Stops filtering
customer_reviews.text: This pitcher consistently stops filtering water. It takes so long, when it does filter, that I end up forgetting about it and not getting my daily water intake. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this pitcher. It was easy to assemble, and I like that it holds more than the average water pitcher. The water tastes clean & refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Lady V

customer_reviews.title: Cracked filter reservoir and useless timer shows quality control problems and poor design decisions
customer_reviews.text: Pitcher filter insert came cracked. Leaks unfiltered water into filtered water reservoir. Didn’t notice until too late to return. LCD display is useless on top since cold causes the numbers to become unreadable. Al in all it’s not bad, but quality control and poor design bring it down several points.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit reluctant to buy this product bought another brand and the water taste like metal, but I'm glad I bought this one ... easy to use and refill and the water taste great ,I'll be buying another one for work
customer_reviews.author: G. david

customer_reviews.title: Good value, and it actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and does what it is intended to do. I tested the pH of the water after filtering through the pitcher and the filtered water is alkaline, about a pH of 8. Water tastes pretty good too. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: McKayla

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is meant to do. No longer will I have to purchase individual drinking water bottles as I did in the past. I now have the convenience and “savability” of using the Dragonn for my water supply.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Munger

customer_reviews.title: Filters stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset. I bought this so I could drink the water I need for my dietary needs. This filtration system is VERY expensive for what it is. It started out working just fine, I followed the directions to prepare the filters properly. Halfway through the life of the filter, it completely stops filtering water through. I’ve tried shaking the filter, drying it out and re-prepping it - nothing as worked.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Use tap water and it’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pitcher with great tasting water. The only con is that it filters pretty slowly. A lot of reviews that have a problem with it say it leaks or doesn’t drain at all, I have had no issues with leaking at all however I did find the instructions are Quite serious when they say only use tap water. Tap water filters right through like normal but bottled or already filtered fridge water don’t filter at all. So just use tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Water just sits in the top
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get going ( filtering super slow drip ). After a few times filter got clogged again and again and again. Very frustrating. I just give up sometimes. Water just sits in the top. That’s my only problem but that’s a big one. Would not recommend. Would like to resolve if manufacturer would like to contact me. If resolved 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Best alkaline pitcher I have found
customer_reviews.text: Best water pitcher I have used. It's just me but it sure does seem to go pretty quick so will need to re-order pretty frequently, but i love how the top stays on and the size. Overall I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Carol C. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good... I bought a PH testing kit. The water from my tap is neutral PH before the pitcher/filter... the water from my pitcher/filter is extremely alkaline. I highly recommend this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Healthy water
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I'm drinking more water, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Glenn

customer_reviews.title: I really like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I really like the picture. It doesn't hold much water before you have to empty it. So I fill up another pitcher with the filtered water then continue to fill up the dragon filter. I tested the water before and after and there was an increase in the alkaline significantly. So that was my purpose of the pitcher. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: water pitcher
customer_reviews.text: To be honest with you- I don't like the pitcher. I can only get it to make a small amount of water and it takes about 12 hours and there isn't enough water to drink. Perhaps the filter isn't working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water tasted just as bad as the tap and doesnt filter out any flouride
customer_reviews.text: Water tasted just as bad as the tap and doesnt filter out any flouride. Pretty bad that you say '1filter for free' when it only comes with one! Clearly that's just '1 included' as it's required to use the product... very deceiving. Although, there is worse on the market for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Lid stays on!
customer_reviews.text: Love that the lid does not come off when pouring and it is a large pitcher and I use the filters that don't need to soak!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Used this while my RO was out of commission due to kitchen remodel. Improved the tap taste and made me feel safer. Now, comparing my RO "fresh squeezed) and softened water vs. the Dragonn pH that restores the alkaline I can tell no difference in taste. Still a great thing to bring on timeshare stays and other car travel time.
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Shobe

customer_reviews.title: Good filter
customer_reviews.text: It filters a full load of water in less than 5 minutes (estimate I haven't measured it) and the water tastes great. I wish it filtered fluoride but other than that I'm very happy with it. Maybe they can make a filter that filters fluoride that can be used with this model?
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: So far this is great, definitely had to get used to it
customer_reviews.text: So far this is great, definitely had to get used to it, but, I think a part of it has something to do with the filter possibly taking awhile to actually start working properly. I followed the recommendation of leaving the filter in a bowl of warm water for approximately 5 minutes before actually using, but, it still tasted like tap water. I'd say after a week or so, the tap water taste went away, so for my next filter that I buy, I will probably just run it under the faucet for 5 minutes instead of leaving it in a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Kevs_Ram06

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a friend. She loves it. Got here a day early on top of that!
customer_reviews.author: dcwayland

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! The water taste great and the pitcher is well made. The digital reader works great and the flap on the spout does not fall off. I really enjoy using this alkaline pitcher!
customer_reviews.author: Petula A. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Hoped for better quality. Water does not drain well thru filter. Top not sturdy and falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Pitcher very small
customer_reviews.text: This does not hold enough water. I went to fill up my Keriig coffee maker and it barely filled it. Then it takes forever to fill up and there is always water sitting, seemingly waiting to go down. I love the idea of it and will look for another one. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: judy c

customer_reviews.title: And we all love it. Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Me and my family have been using this Pitcher for a few weeks. And we all love it. Easy to use and clean. No spilling when transfering into a cup. FIILTER IS GREAT nice steady flow! You can see the difference in color of water and definitely in taste! I Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JTSWpe

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, but has a plastic taste and filter already having plugging issues. Work great at first, I have to keep taking filter out and give ever so slightly shake to unplug the stream.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Hogg

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to filter water if at that
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge waste of mny the water just sits in the filter and doesn't move. Ive had to piur the water iut and run water through the filter to see if it works and majority of the time it doesn't. So now im going to have to add more water like i do to see when it will decide to filter in the meantime the water that has been there will just sit there. Im going to havento find a better one because this one is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Don't Know
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure this works. I tested the water when I first put it together and it was great, over 8. A week later I tested it and it was down to 6.6, the same as our tap water. So it appears the filter doesn't last the whole month. I'm thinking of trying one more filter but not sure I want to invest more money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Teddette

customer_reviews.title: Great little pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and followed the instructions for soaking the filter. There isn’t any mention anywhere about removing the plastic shield on the bottom of the filter. I discovered it after soaking filter 2 times. I’ve just started using the pitcher but I can say that I like the slim design and the ease of use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Shrewsbury

customer_reviews.title: Broken Lid
customer_reviews.text: Lid came broken twice. We had a replacement sent to us and the filter life screen does not work. For the price of this water filter it’s not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: aaron weier

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it works.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this does anything to the water as I didn't purchase the strips to find out. Tasted ok in the beginning, after a couple weeks it tastes worse than the tap. Pretty color and I can keep the pitcher for other stuff but a huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Opthof

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Water!
customer_reviews.text: Brandsma Review I’ll never buy a Britta again! This water filtering pitcher is high quality at a lower price! It came promptly with excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Tested the ph and it went from 7 to 9.4!
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigues Mark Edward

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we couldn't find water before the hurricane, and I spend a lot of money on alkaline water, as I drink it daily. This was the best idea. I will keep using this and save money. I check the ph at the beginning and at 30 days, and its still between 9-10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pitcher
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pitcher! I have tried many things for my acid reflux but drinking alkaline water helps more than anything. This is a great money saver for me! Update: after using this pitcher for 6 months I still love it! I got much better results with this pitcher than any medication (one of which had a $95 co-pay) I have tried for acid reflux. I am definitely a believer!
customer_reviews.author: the paintedPigg

customer_reviews.title: Great pitcher!
customer_reviews.text: We have had very good performance from the Dragonn Alkaline Water Pitcher.I will continue to use this item and update if any issues should arise.Great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. I use drops to test the after. Its definitely alkaline. So much easier than using the ion pod I bought several years ago.
customer_reviews.author: mmorris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Water taste great! I do not have pH testing to see the difference but a big positive in just the taste. So I definitely recommend this if your water needs a little help.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good product but the filter doesn’t work sometimes
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product and the water taste great. But the filter seems to clog up at times. So you either have to shake it around for a while or take the filter out and shake/tap it so it will work. Not sure how to get in contact with the company to address or fix issue. Other than that it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrell

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 product
customer_reviews.text: Package was delivered without another box protecting my package so I believe the item could be damaged the water leaks thru the sides of the filter into the clean water that’s already been filtered so don’t see the point in having a water filter if I’m still getting unfiltered water into my clean water
customer_reviews.author: Tony Miguel Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied. Wish the instructions that came with it were ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to get used to how it works. Once I understood the principle of it, I'm very satisfied. Wish the instructions that came with it were more comprehensive, would have saved me a lot of guessing and a mediocre first review. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: kluv

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I can actually taste the difference between our Britta pitcher and our new alkaline pitcher. The alkaline water is crisp, fresh and a lot cleaner taste to it. It's not just me that can taste it my son and my parents too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Maricel D. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Filter life is less than a week !
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this pitcher back in 2017 while in another Country and the filters always worked flawlessly. Fast forward to 2019, I’ve gone thru three filters (two of which were replacements sent by succinct support) and none have lasted for more than a week ! The customer service is EXCELLENT the product is NOT SO MUCH, stay away
customer_reviews.author: JK5627

customer_reviews.title: Useless - worst product!
customer_reviews.text: The lid does NOT fit any way shape or form. Also very poor instructions...it did not seem to flush out dark color before use. It stopped working almost immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Elly redo

customer_reviews.title: Works good but didn't increase alkalinity
customer_reviews.text: Will not increase the ph to alkaline our city water is already 8.5 but does filter good went 1.5 months before changing filter I don't even use the digital thing on top
customer_reviews.author: Julieth

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It does filter the water but you the water taste funny no matter how many times you filter it
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Water tastes great but it is slow, takes hours to filter and doesn't filter all the water in the fill resivore. Not worth the trouble. Didn't get a chance to test the pH yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wasting a lot of time and water to get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I soaked and rinsed the filter multiple times before running water through to drink. But every time I add water, I have to take it apart, and tap, shake, and rinse the filter multiple times to get water to flow through. If I don't, it just sits in the top and won't flow through. Regret buying and will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I tested the PH and it was 9.3.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I tested the PH and it was 9.3.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid C.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, slowly filters but tastes better
customer_reviews.text: The reservoir does not completely filter all the water and there’s always at least an inch or more in the reservoir. It filters slowly too but this doesn’t bother me so much. I just leave it alone for an hour or so. The water does taste better & I assume the pH is higher. I think you should consider putting some testing strips in the package in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I got caught up in the reviews thinking this was the one. All these good reviews and it didn’t work for me. Be wary, the water doesn’t filter 90% of the time and I have to mess with it for the water to go down. Everything is in tac, this product just sucks. Horrible buy. Spend a few bucks more and get you something that works. Big waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It stinks
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the taste and smell aren't good. I followed directions, but the results were very disappointing. I don't have a return sticker to mail it back. I want a refund. I still have the box and unused fillers. Look forward to hearing from you. Thanks, Lisa
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Assoni

product_meta.title: DRAGONN Alkaline Water Pitcher - 3.5 Liters, Free Filter Included, Removes Lead, Chlorine, Copper and more, PH 8.5-9.5 Enhanced 2019 Model (DN-KW-WP01)
feature_bullets: FRESH, INSTANTLY FILTERED ALKALINE WATER - Utilizes 7 stage cartridge - removing chlorine, odors, and heavy metals. Removes 90% of all zinc, copper, lead, and pollutants to create an amazingly delicious alkaline beverage. INCLUDES 1 (one) CARTRIDGE.....Be sure to remove shipping stickers from bottom of cartridge when first received.

UNIQUE DESIGN - The slim pitcher easily fits in any refrigerator, and the lid lets you fill the reservoir without removing the cover. Easy Pour Spout ensures the perfect pour with no mess! Ergonomic Handle provides comfort during use.
ECONOMICAL & ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - Eliminates Plastic bottles - Premium (BPA FREE) food grade with AS and ABS materials.

MANY BENEFITS OF DRINKING ALKALINE WATER - Removes Free radicals and Eliminates Toxins with powerful ANTIOXIDANTS, and HIGH NEGATIVE ORP (Oxidation-Reduction Potential is a measurement to oxidize contaminants) - INCREASES ENERGY LEVELS & IMMUNE SYSTEM.
FULLER FLAVOR - The cartridge filter gives water a fuller flavor for better coffee and tea. It also provides healthier water for cooking that leads to tastier food for the entire family!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars946 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
